actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-405.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 6135, a bill to amend the U.S. Grain Standards Act with respect to recordkeeping requirements and supervision fees.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6135 (United States Grain Standards Act Amendments).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 6135, a bill to amend the U.S. Grain Standards Act with respect to recordkeeping requirements and supervision fees.
